member.name: M:OrchardCore.ContentManagement.GraphQL.Options.GraphQLContentOptions.ShouldCollapse(OrchardCore.ContentManagement.Metadata.Models.ContentTypePartDefinition)
member.summary:
Collapsing works at a hierarchy
If the Content Type is marked at collapsed, then all parts are collapsed. If the Content Type is not marked collapsed, then it falls down to the content type under it. If the Content Part at a top level is marked collapsed, then it will trump above.
